blobs.changelog:
- MQTT HA device registration.
- Wi-Fi connection behavior refactored.
- Align MQTT sensors with latest HA.
- Increased buffer for P1 telegrams.
- Some minor bug fixes and other changes.
Requires Home Assistant version 2021.11 or later!

- Home Assistant availiability support (MQTT will/testament).
- Add timestamp sensor for last received meter telegram.
- Add firmware update available and firmware version sensor.
- Improve LED blinking schema for easier troubleshooting.
- Improve logging details.
- Add software tweaks to improve power consumption.
- HW revision efuse support.
- Remove 'homeassistant/sensor/'-part from MQTT state topics.
- 'P1IB' remove from sensors friendly name to make it a bit cleaner in HA dashboards.
- Add energy export and momentary power export in summary card in web ui.
- Add p1ib svg icon header in menues.
- Change to correct device class on sensors (note kVArh not supported by HA, will produce varnings in HA).
- Add separate availability topic for telegram received sensor.
- Add NTP servers configurable from web ui.
- Filter out empty ssid:s during wifi scan.
- Fix uptime overflow bug (efter 50days).
- Add support for custom/hidden Wi-Fi SSID in web ui.
